actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-570.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 5 and against consideration of such conference report, and providing for the consideration of a bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Waives points of order against the conference report on H.R. 5 (education programs) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 5 and against consideration of such conference report, and providing for the consideration of a bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934.
